void clearErrors (   ) 
 

Resets the flag used by errorsOccurred().

bool errorsOccurred (   ) 
 

Returns true if NEDError() has been called since the last clearErrors().

void NEDError (  NEDElement *  context,
const char *  message,
  ...
) 
 

Adds a compiler error message.

Currently the message is printed to the standard error; this is going to be refined.

void NEDInternalError (  const char *  file,
int  line,
NEDElement *  context,
const char *  message,
  ...
) 
 

Called when an internal error occurs.

It prints an appropriate message, then calls abort(). This method is typically used via the INTERNAL_ERROR0()...INTERNAL_ERROR4() macros that add the __FILE__, __LINE__ args implicitly.
